name: Orphan Black Tumblr Dashboard Buttons
description: Orphan Black Buttons for the Tumblr Dashboard. Including Sarah's gun, Alison's soccer ball, Cosima's DNA helix, Helena's angel wings (for xkit, if installed), Tony's mullet (for the help if xkit is not installed, and on all pages where the xkit button is not shown) and Rachel's Dyad Institute sign. Works with the update mess fomr 10/30/2014.
